description.p: Implements a standardized UD page header with a fixed content width of 930 pixels. The background of the header is a wavy blue gradient. The header features a large-print graphical "University of Delaware" logo with the UD shield and a toolbar that includes a Google search form and links to common UD web services.

The default hidden HTML form fields for the Google search toolbar can be found in /www/htdocs/defaults/header-gsa.html. To override the defaults, copy this file to your web directory and edit accordingly. All templated pages in that directory (and sub-directories of it) will make use of the form fields you include in your local copy of header-gsa.html.
